text: â€œNdipo ndithu tidatuma atumiki patsogolo pako iwe usanadze ndipo tidawalola kukhala ndi akazi ndi ana; (sichachilendo iwe kukhala ndi akazi ndi ana). Ndipo nkosatheka kwa mtumiki kudzetsa chozizwitsa koma pokhapokha ndi chilolezo cha Allah. Nyengo iliyonse ili ndi lamulo lake limene Allah adalilemba. (Nyengoyo ikakwana, lamulo limadza)
